name: Cenourinha's Adventure
description:
Help Cenourinha find her way back home!

Use the arrow keys to move.

Use the spacebar key to interact with menus. 

Stomp on enemies to kill them. 

Follow the signs along the way!

Many thanks to the owners of the assets used on Cenourinha's Adventure:
